name: Beedrill
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: This attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage for each Beedrill (excluding this one) you have in play.

name: Butterfree
AbilityText: As long as Butterfree is your Active Pokemon, remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokemon between turns.
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Dewgong
AbilityText: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Dewgong by your opponent's Pokemon-ex.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Ditto
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your discard pile for a Basic Pokemon (excluding Pokemon-ex and Ditto) and switch it with Ditto. (Any cards attached to Ditto, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokemon.) Place Ditto in the discard pile.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Ditto but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more then 20 damage in this way.

name: Exeggutor
Attack1Text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Draw up to 8 cards.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin for each Energy attached to Exeggutor. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

name: Kangaskhan
Attack1Text: Draw a card.

name: Marowak
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Basic Pokemon and each Evolution card in your discard pile. You can't add more than 60 damage in this way.

name: Nidoking
AbilityText: As long as Nidoking is in play, your attacks by Nidoran ♀, Nidorina, Nidoqueen, Nidoran ♂, and Nidorino do 10 more damage to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 60 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Nidoking can't use Bound Crush during your next turn.

name: Nidoqueen
AbilityText: As long as Nidoqueen is in play, the Retreat Cost for Nidoran ♀, Nidorina, Nidoran ♂, Nidorino and Nidoking is 0.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on the Defending Pokemon between turns.
Attack2Text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Evolved Pokemon you have in play.

name: Pidgeot
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose any 1 card from your deck and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Quick Search Poke-Power each turn. This power can't be used if Pidgeot is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Poliwrath
AbilityText: As long as Poliwrath is your Active Pokemon, your opponent's Confused Pokemon can't retreat.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is Pokemon-ex, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Raichu
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Lightning Energy cards and attach them to Raichu. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: You may move any number of Lightning Energy cards attached to Raichu to another of your Pokemon.

name: Rapidash
AbilityText: As long as Rapidash is your Active Pokemon, put 4 damage counters instead of 2 on Burned Pokemon between turns.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Slowbro
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokemon to Slowbro as long as you don't Knock Out Slowbro. This power can't be used if Slowbro is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Snorlax
AbilityText: If Snorlax remains Asleep between turns, remove 2 damage counters from Snorlax (remove 1 if there is only 1).
Attack1Text: Snorlax is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: If Snorlax is Asleep, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage. (This attack can be used even if Snorlax is Asleep.)

name: Tauros
Attack1Text: You may discard any Stadium card in play.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Tauros. After doing damage, flip a coin. If tails, Tauros is now Confused.

name: Victreebel
AbilityText: As long as Victreebel is your Active Pokemon, put 1 damage counter on each Defending Pokemon between turns. Acid Sampler stops working if your other Active Pokemon is not a Victreebel.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Arcanine
Attack2Text: Arcanine does 10 damage to itself.

name: Chansey
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, Chansey does 50 damage to the Defending Pokemon. If tails, remove 5 damage counters from Chansey. (All if there are less than 5.)

name: Cloyster
AbilityText: Any damage done to Cloyster by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads. If either of the coins is heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Dodrio
AbilityText: As long as Dodrio is on your Bench, you pay ColorlessColorless less to retreat your Active Pokemon (excluding Pokemon-ex and Baby Pokemon.)
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Dugtrio
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Farfetch'd
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Pokemon Tool cards and attach them to any of your Pokemon (excluding Pokemon that already have a Pokemon Tool attached to them). Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is an Evolved Pokemon, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Fearow
AbilityText: If Fearow has no Energy attached to it, Fearow's Retreat Cost is 0.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Hypno
AbilityText: As long as Hypno is your Active Pokemon, put 2 damage counters on each Pokemon that remains Asleep between turns.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Kingler
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Water Energy cards and attach them to Kingler. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each basic Energy attached to Kingler but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 40 damage in this way.

name: Magneton
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokemon.

name: Primeape
Attack1Text: You may discard from your hand as many Technical Machine and Pokemon Tool cards as you like. This attack does 30 damage times the number of cards you discarded.

name: Scyther
AbilityText: If Scyther has any Energy attached to it, Scyther's Retreat Cost is 0.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. If 1 of them is heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage. If 2 of them are heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage. If all of them are heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 40 more damage.

name: Tangela
Attack1Text: Look at your Prize cards without showing your opponent. Choose 1 of the Prize cards and switch it with the top card of your deck without looking at the top card of your deck. If you have no cards in your deck, this attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Charmeleon
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Drowzee
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Exeggcute
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Haunter
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Haunter is on your Bench, you may use this power. One of your Active Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Ivysaur
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Kakuna
AbilityText: If Kakuna is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Kakuna is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Lickitung
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Mankey
Attack1Text: Shuffle your opponent's deck.

name: Metapod
AbilityText: Any damage done to Metapod by attacks is reduced by 10 for each Energy attached to Metapod. You can't reduce more than 30 damage in this way.

name: Nidorina
Attack2Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Evolution cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Nidorino
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Onix
Attack2Text: Choose up to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Onix can't attack during your next turn.

name: Parasect
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards and attach them to any of your Pokemon (excluding Pokemon-ex) in any way you like. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Persian
AbilityText: Persian can't be affected by any Special Conditions.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Pidgeotto
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Poliwhirl
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for a basic Energy card and attach it to Poliwhirl.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Porygon
Attack1Text: If you have less than 4 cards in your hand, draw cards until you have 4 cards in your hand.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Raticate
AbilityText: Raticate can't be affected by any Special Conditions.
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for a Basic Pokemon (or Evolution card), a Trainer card, and an Energy card. Show them to your opponent and put them into your hand.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 40 more damage.

name: Venomoth
AbilityText: Prevent all effects of attacks, except damage, done to Venomoth by the Attacking Pokemon.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep and Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Wartortle
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Wartortle but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.
Attack2Text: After your attack, you may switch Wartortle with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Weepinbell
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Wigglytuff
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Wigglytuff is on your Bench, you may choose 1 of your Active Pokemon and remove 1 Special Condition from it.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Wigglytuff by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Bulbasaur
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep and Poisoned.

name: Bulbasaur
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Caterpie
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Metapod and a Butterfree card, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Charmander
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Clefairy
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon and switch it with the Defending Pokemon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokemon to switch.

name: Cubone
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Diglett
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

name: Doduo
Attack1Text: Switch Doduo with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each heads.

name: Gastly
Attack1Text: At the end of your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Jigglypuff
Attack1Text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with 1 of the Defending Pokemon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokemon to switch. The new Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Krabby
Attack2Text: Remove 2 damage counters from Krabby (remove 1 if there is only 1).

name: Magikarp
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from Magikarp and put it on Magikarp. (This counts as evolving Magikarp.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Magnemite
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Meowth
Attack1Text: Draw a card.

name: Nidoran ♀
Attack1Text: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Basic Pokemon. Show that card to your opponent and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other revealed cards into your deck. (If you don't reveal a Basic Pokemon, shuffle all the revealed cards back into your deck.)

name: Nidoran ♂
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Nidoran ♀ or Nidoran ♂ card and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Paras
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokemon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Pidgey
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Pikachu
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to Pikachu.

name: Poliwag
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Ponyta
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Rattata
Attack1Text: Draw a card.

name: Seel
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Shellder
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Shellder by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Slowpoke
Attack1Text: Both Slowpoke and the Defending Pokemon are now Confused.

name: Spearow
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Squirtle
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Squirtle
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: After your attack, you may switch Squirtle with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Venonat
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy card attached to Venonat. The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Voltorb
AbilityText: As long as Voltorb has any Energy attached to it, Voltorb's Retreat Cost is 0.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Weedle
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Grass Basic Pokemon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Discard a Grass Energy card attached to Weedle. The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
